qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Effect: promotes community cohesion and protection

remarks: Assumes “these tales” refers to the previously mentioned stories/urban legends.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories disseminated online can reach a global audience.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Story and Legend Audiences (including Cautionary Narratives)

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: via internet and social media dissemination

args.canonical_rel_desc: Community or group circulates or communicates stories or narratives among its members.
args.justification: The subject is a community and the object is stories; the description emphasizes that communities share tales among members, so a predicate focused on sharing narratives is appropriate and readable.

args.canonical_rel_desc: A story or narrative attains exposure to, or becomes accessible by, an audience.
args.justification: The subject is stories and the object is a global audience; the description explicitly states that stories disseminated online can reach a global audience, so a predicate expressing audience reach fits best.

Both relations concern how stories are communicated or spread: one describes communities sharing stories, the other stories reaching a global audience. They naturally group into a class about dissemination of narratives.
Both predicates describe communication flows involving stories and recipients (community members or a global audience), so they belong in a broad communication-oriented relation group.
